transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%\n+4% Ally Team Critical Damage
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%\n+4% Ally Team Critical Damage
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Ballad of a Soldier
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict Burned on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. This effect ignores the target's Resilience.
description: Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000073_1_1]</color> chance to inflict Burned on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000073_1_1] turn(s)</color>. This effect ignores the target's Resilience.

SKT_SECOND.name: Paths of Glory
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Detonates all Burned stacks on the target, and increases damage dealt by detonation by <color=#28d9ed>50%</color>. Increases damage dealt to Earth targets by an additional <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases damage\nEnhances Detonation on Earth targets

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Increases Burned duration by 2 turns when detonating

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nReduces Apocalypse Now cooldown by 2 turns

description: Attacks all enemies. Detonates all Burned stacks on the target, and increases damage dealt by detonation by <color=#28d9ed>50%</color>. Increases damage dealt to Earth targets by an additional <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Apocalypse Now
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Inflicts Burned on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color> (Applied 2 times). This effect ignores the target's Resilience, and resets cooldown when an enemy is defeated.
description: Attacks all enemies. Inflicts Burned on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000073_3_1] turn(s)</color> (Applied 2 times). This effect ignores the target's Resilience, and resets cooldown when an enemy is defeated.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict Burned on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000073_chain_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000073_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000073_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict Burned on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000073_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
